hero.title: Ruaa Beauty
hero.subtitle: Where Elegance Meets Craftsmanship
hero.description: We offer premium lash extensions, lash lifts, brow lifts, professional makeup, facial threading, and stunning Mehendi (Henna) designs. Whether it's for a wedding, a celebration, or any special occasion ‚Äî in our studio or in the comfort of your home ‚Äî all the beauty you need is right here in one place.

home.ctaDescription: Browse our collection of premium beauty products and find your perfect match.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.lead: Whatever you need ‚Äî we're here to help!
contact.generalBookingsDescription: If you want to order lashes or book lash lifts, brow lifts, professional makeup, or facial threading, contact us on:
contact.mehendiBookingsDescription: If you want to book Mehendi, contact us on:
contact.bothServices: If you want to book both beauty services + Mehendi, feel free to reach out on either number or message us on Instagram ‚Äî we'll take care of everything!
contact.perfectLook: Your perfect look starts with a message.

bookingForm.title: Reserve Your Appointment
bookingForm.priceLashLift: Natural lift, curl, and defined lashes
bookingForm.lashLiftDescription: A technique that lifts the natural lashes from the root to give a defined curl and a beautiful look without extensions.
bookingForm.lashLiftHow: How it's done: The lashes are softened with special steps to make lifting easier, then shaped and fixed to create a natural and long-lasting curl.
bookingForm.lashLiftResult: Result: Longer, lifted, curled lashes lasting 6‚Äì8 weeks.
bookingForm.priceBrowLift: Perfectly shaped, lifted, and defined brows
bookingForm.browLiftDescription: Lifting and setting the brow hairs for a fuller, softer, well-shaped look.
bookingForm.browLiftHow: How it's done: The hairs are softened, shaped into the desired direction, and fixed for long-lasting results.
bookingForm.browLiftResult: Result: Fuller, lifted, neatly shaped brows lasting 4‚Äì6 weeks.
bookingForm.combinedLashBrowDescription: Lash Lift + Brow Lift in the same session.
bookingForm.combinedLashBrowHow: How it's done: Complete eye and brow transformation with both lash lift and brow lift services performed together for optimal results.
bookingForm.combinedLashBrowResult: Result: A clean, complete look for the eyes and brows at a discounted price.
bookingForm.priceMakeup: Customized event makeup with soft, clean, well-balanced colors
bookingForm.eventMakeupDescription: Customized event makeup with soft, clean, well-balanced colors.
bookingForm.eventMakeupIncludes: Includes: Skin prep, Comfortable long-lasting base, Color palette matched to event & style
bookingForm.eventMakeupHow: How it's done: Skin prep, comfortable long-lasting base application, and color palette matched to your event and personal style.
bookingForm.eventMakeupResult: Result: A clean, elegant look perfect for photos.
bookingForm.priceBridalMakeup: Bridal makeup for your special day, elegant and radiant
bookingForm.bridalMakeupDescription: Full professional bridal makeup for an elegant, long-lasting look.
bookingForm.bridalMakeupHow: How it's done: Deep skin prep, color & technique selection based on features, luxury details suitable for bridal looks, and lashes included.
bookingForm.bridalMakeupResult: Result: Elegant, glowing bridal look that photographs beautifully.
bookingForm.priceMehendi: Intricate, unique, and beautiful henna designs
bookingForm.priceThreading: Precise, gentle, and professional facial threading
bookingForm.threadingDescription: Precise shaping and hair removal for eyebrows, upper lip, chin, or full face.
bookingForm.threadingHow: How it's done: Smooth skin, clean look, perfectly shaped brows.
bookingForm.threadingResult: Result: Smooth skin, clean look, perfectly shaped brows.

bookingForm.supportMessageTitle: Don't find a time that works for you?
bookingForm.supportMessageContent: Please feel free to contact us. We'll do our best to adjust the schedule and find a time that suits you ‚Äî your comfort and happiness are our top priority.

mehendi.heroTitle: Exquisite Mehendi Designs for Every Occasion
mehendi.heroDescription: Celebrate your special moments with our intricate Mehendi artistry. From weddings and engagements to festive gatherings, we create stunning hand and arm designs that are as unique as you. Beautiful, detailed, and crafted with love.
